thread.title: Cubs' Anthony Rizzo invites boy attacked at school to Wrigley Field
thread.title_full: Cubs' Anthony Rizzo invites boy attacked at school to Wrigley Field

author: Gabrielle McMillen (gabrielle.McMillen@performgroup.com)
title: Cubs' Anthony Rizzo invites boy attacked at school to Wrigley Field
text:
— Anthony Rizzo (@ARizzo44) February 7, 2017 
Sembdner was badly beaten at his suburban Chicago middle school and sustained facial fractures and injuries to his brain, the Chicago Tribune reported . 
He remains hospitalized, but his school has decided to wear Cubs gear to show support. 
Many others have already donated $21,275 through GoFundMe to Sembdner's family for his medical bills. 
Rizzo followed up on his support for Sembdner, saying he will re-tweet photos of the boy's classmates wearing their Cubs attire. Heard Henry's school will be wearing @Cubs gear tom to show their support Wear ur gear & I'll RT pics.Let's all show our support #StayStrong — Anthony Rizzo (@ARizzo44) February 7, 2017 Watch This
